vision.color_delta¶

vision.color_delta(color1, color2)[source]¶

Percentage difference between two colors

Parameters:
  • color1 (tuple) – color in the format of (r, g, b)
  • color2 (str) – color in the format of (r, g, b)
Returns:

difference – the percent difference between the two colors None if input value out of range
Return type:

float

Examples

Find the difference between (223, 42, 5) and (47, 156, 89)

>>> from cloudburst import vision as cbv
>>> difference = cbv.color_delta((223, 42, 5), (47, 156, 89))
>>> print(difference)
